channel.title: iPhone 4S Pre-Orders Sell Out
channel.description:
Apple only started taking orders for their new iPhone of Friday, but it must be a popular one.
Pre-orders are already sold out around the world.
Could this be because of the theory: "iPhone [b]4S[/b]teve (Jobs)"?
I just wouldn't expect this many people to buy them, considering how many people already have the iPhone 4.

item.title: iPhone 4S Pre-Orders Sell Out
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I’m lmfao at the ‘4Steve’ theory. People need to stop making stuff up.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S Pre-Orders Sell Out
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:15, topic:417640”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=520192.msg3777990#msg3777990 date=1318241876]
It’s probably just because most of the people that bought an iPhone 3GS (when iPhones really began to get popular) were on 2 year contracts, and of course that contract has just come to an end, so they want to upgrade.
It’ll be the same with the iPhone 5 when it comes, number 4 was the best selling phone to date, and their contracts will all end in time for iPhone 5.
[/quote]
2 year contracts? You must not live in Canada…

Here you’re forced into a 3 year contract just to get a subsidized iPhone - that or you pay the full price! It’s ridiculous[/quote]
Oh wow, foreign networks are weird, I’m in the UK, here you either go pay as you go/unlocked for £500, 24 month contract which at the moment on the 4S start at around £41 a month with no handset cost, or 18 month which is relatively the same only a fair bit more expensive.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S Pre-Orders Sell Out
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:12, topic:417640”]It’s probably just because most of the people that bought an iPhone 3GS (when iPhones really began to get popular) were on 2 year contracts, and of course that contract has just come to an end, so they want to upgrade.
It’ll be the same with the iPhone 5 when it comes, number 4 was the best selling phone to date, and their contracts will all end in time for iPhone 5.[/quote]
2 year contracts? You must not live in Canada…

Here you’re forced into a 3 year contract just to get a subsidized iPhone - that or you pay the full price! It’s ridiculous

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S Pre-Orders Sell Out
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

I just like the design of the Iphone 4/4s versus the Ipods (The back is curved, this one has corners…) I wish they would do that with Ipods, because I wouldn’t want to buy it just because of the look (Because thats the only reason I would see myself buying this.)

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S Pre-Orders Sell Out

item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

I like the upgraded camera, but it’s not enough for me to go ahead and buy the phone like an apple fan boy. I’ll stick with my 4.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S Pre-Orders Sell Out
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

It’s probably just because most of the people that bought an iPhone 3GS (when iPhones really began to get popular) were on 2 year contracts, and of course that contract has just come to an end, so they want to upgrade.
It’ll be the same with the iPhone 5 when it comes, number 4 was the best selling phone to date, and their contracts will all end in time for iPhone 5.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S Pre-Orders Sell Out
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:5, topic:417640”][quote author=CreatorAlex link=topic=520192.msg3777439#msg3777439 date=1318194131]
Well considering I’ve never owned an Apple product, I’m clueless to how good the iPhone 4S must be.

Here’s something I found:

[ig]http://9to5mac.files.wordpress.com/2011/10/screen-shot-2011-10-04-at-9-04-42-pm.png[/img]
[/quote]

All the things my $100 phone has had for over a year now![/quote]What phone?
